title: Crabgrass Confidence Interval
question_text:
Rob applied preventative herbicide/fertilizer to stop crabgrass in his lawn. He applied $4$ levels of treatment, each to $4$ sections of his lawn at random, and recorded the change in crabgrass plants per square meter. The data is given below:
Regression analysis was performed and a $98\%$ confidence interval for the slope of the true regression line of change in crabgrass on treatment was constructed.
$98\%$ Confidence Interval: $ (-1.134, -0.8364)$
Interpret the meaning of this interval in context.
